column4: hi all, i just downloaded deluge, how do i enable encryption. and second of all, when i select a torrent (gutsy) i select a download directory and nothing happens
hmm evanlec, fkmuro, its not in here. theres two tabs, General, and Network. neither of them have anything for encryption
In deluge, go to preferences, click the network tab, and at the bottom you will see a checkbox for "Prefer to encrypt the entire stream"
